ygData.subject: Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Fracturcon looks at Sniper with a glare, knowing that if he shoots it out with this Maximal then he ll have to shoot it out with every transformer on the ship,

Fracturcon looks at Sniper with a glare, knowing that if he shoots it out w=
ith this Maximal then he'll have to shoot it out with every transformer on =
the ship, including Predicons.
FRACTURCON: "Hold on there, I'm not here to =
fight you.  You are a Maximal & so am I.  Although I don't have any interes=
t getting involved with your little war, I am aware of what the presence of=
 transformers on the Ark means to the timeline.  The last Beast War almost =
saw the alteration of our timeline & I cannot allow you bots to wage your w=
ar in here.  I have 3 Sentinel drones on the way here as we speak.  They ha=
ve orders to post postions outside the Ark & fire upon any Predicons that s=
how their ugly mugs.  Although I don't share your beliefs as far as the BEa=
st Wars goes, I am aware that the Predicons will do whatever it takes to wi=
n, even alter the timeline.  I do not like the fact that the Maximals are i=
n here too but I know their motives are not to alter the timeline.  It's up=
 to you Maximal, we can go ahead & slag each other to molten metal or we ca=
n hook up, find your comerades, & slag the remaining Preds in here.  It's u=
p to you!"
As Fracturcon waits for Sniper to make his choice, he readies hi=
s missiles for launch.  If he has to take both factions on himself, so be i=
t.
